/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the perspective. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, looking up at the buildings and the sky.
